node.name: Gaining Access
node.rich_text:
- I checked for possible sql injection, CSRF and other common vulnerabilities. - I checked for exploits for the version of RT. But couldnt find the code. - Then I checked default login credentials and it worked. Now I am logged in to the portal. (took hint)
Then I checked in the menu and opened users details.
Here I got 2 users: - Lise Norgaard - Enoch Root
I will try to brute force SSH using Hydra.
I mistakenly clicked ‘Email Address’ and found this :
